thread.title: excellent location - Review
thread.title_full: excellent location - Review of Ibis Paris Opera la Fayette, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mouchira
title: excellent location - Review
text: excellent location near gallerie lafayette and near lindt store and le printemps alson you have many restaurants near the hotel, i want to thank mr. adnan at the reception as we came in the early morning and i forget to inform the reception so he helped us for getting a room quickly as for the housekeeping the room is clean but in our check out date we left the room at 12.30 pm as for the reception they have been nice and didn.t say anything on the contrary the lady of the housekeeping was knocking every 5 minutes in a rude way and when i told her we will leave at 12.30 she didn.t like this anyway i would like nice the reception team for being nice and helpful
